comment:
* Interface representing a runner for an insets animation.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: int getTypes()
methods.comment: * @return The {@link InsetsType} the animation of this runner controls.

methods.name: int getControllingTypes()
methods.comment:
* @return The {@link InsetsType} the animation of this runner is controlling. This can be
     *         changed if a control is revoked.

methods.name: void notifyControlRevoked(@InsetsType int types)
methods.comment: * Notifies {@link InsetsType types} of control are getting revoked.

methods.name: void updateSurfacePosition(SparseArray<InsetsSourceControl> controls)
methods.comment:
* Updates the surface positions of the controls owned by this runner if there is any.
     *
     * @param controls An array of {@link InsetsSourceControl} that the caller newly receives.

methods.name: WindowInsetsAnimation getAnimation()
methods.comment: * @return The animation this runner is running.

methods.name: int getAnimationType()
methods.comment: * @return The animation type this runner is running.

methods.name: ImeTracker.Token getStatsToken()
methods.comment: * @return The token tracking the current IME request or {@code null} otherwise.

methods.name: void updateLayoutInsetsDuringAnimation(@LayoutInsetsDuringAnimation int layoutInsetsDuringAnimation)
methods.comment:
* Updates the desired layout insets during the animation.
     *
     * @param layoutInsetsDuringAnimation Whether the insets should be shown or hidden

methods.name: void dumpDebug(ProtoOutputStream proto, long fieldId)
methods.comment:
*
     * Export the state of classes that implement this interface into a protocol buffer
     * output stream.
     *
     * @param proto Stream to write the state to
     * @param fieldId FieldId of the implementation class
